document_data.caption: A map of the Sword Lands depicting Sword River
document_data.name: Sword River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sword River''' flowed throughout the [[Sword Lands]] and into the [[Dragon Sea (Abeir)|Dragon Sea]], across the lands of the eastern [[Laerakond]].
